mapper.select:
select * from Teacher
and code like "%"#{code}"%"
and name like "%"#{name}"%"
order by id desc
limit ${(currentPage - 1) * 10} , 10

select * from Student
and code like "%"#{code}"%"
and name like "%"#{name}"%"
order by id desc
limit ${(currentPage - 1) * 10} , 10

select st.id,st.code,st.name,st.age,st.sex,st.qq,st.phone,st.address,st.classId,cl.className,gr.gradeName,tea.name teacherName from Class cl inner join Student st on st.classId = cl.id inner join TeacherClass tc on tc.classId = cl.id inner join Grade gr on cl.gradeId = gr.id inner join Teacher tea on tc.tId = tea.id
and code like "%"#{code}"%"
and name like "%"#{name}"%"
order by id desc
limit ${(currentPage - 1) * 10} , 10

select * from Grade
and id = #{gradeId}
order by id desc
limit ${(currentPage - 1) * 10} , 10

select * from Class
and classCode like "%"#{code}"%"
and className like "%"#{name}"%"
order by id desc
limit ${(currentPage - 1) * 10} , 10

select su.id,su.subjectCode,su.subjectName,su.createMessage,su.createTime,su.gradeId,gr.gradeName from Subject su inner join Grade gr on su.gradeId=gr.id
and subjectCode like "%"#{code}"%"
and subjectName like "%"#{name}"%"
order by id desc
limit ${(currentPage - 1) * 10} , 10
select * from TeacherClass
select * from Subject
select * from Habit where code = #{code}

select * from Login
code = #{code}
